title: doc: 1.5 release notes don't mention that go install removes the binary produced by go build
body: After [CL 10682](https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/10682/) go install removes the stale binary that was left by go build. This new behaviour is not documented in the [Go 1.5 Release Notes](http://tip.golang.org/doc/go1.5), which has already [caused some confusion](http://stackoverflow.com/q/32180434/1892060). This should be documented in the release notes (and other build-related documents) along with the rationale for this change.
